content:
The United States Ambassador Bridget Brinka has once again urged Ukraine to provide more assistance against the backdrop of massive missile attacks in Russia.

She is about itwroteIn the social network H.

The ambassador stressed that for the second day in a row, all Ukraine wakes up before dawn because of the threat of hypersonic and winged missiles.

“Russia's barbaric attacks throughout the country continue to threaten civilian population and violate international law. Ukraine needs our help now, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiaShe has done12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, attacked energy objectsSumy regionand Kharkiv region.
title: US Ambassador About Russian Federation Massed: Ukraine immediately needs our help
